devdoc.details: ERC20 token. Its inside value is collatral pool net worth.

addMinerBalance(address,uint256).details: Interface to manager FNX mine pool contract, add miner balance when user has bought some options.  account user's account. amount user's pay for buying options, priced in USD.

addlockBalance(address,uint256,uint256).details: Move user's FPT to locked balance, when user redeem collateral.  account user's account. amount amount of locked FPT. lockedWorth net worth of locked FPT.

allowance(address,address).return: The number of tokens allowed to be spent (-1 means infinite)

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`
approve(address,uint256).return: Whether or not the approval succeeded

balanceOf(address).return: The number of tokens owned by `owner`

burn(address,uint256).details: burn user's FPT when user redeem FPTCoin.  account user's account. amount amount of FPT.

delegateToImplementation(bytes).details: It returns to the external caller whatever the implementation returns or forwards reverts
delegateToImplementation(bytes).return: The returned bytes from the delegatecall

delegateToViewImplementation(bytes).details: It returns to the external caller whatever the implementation returns or forwards reverts There are an additional 2 prefix uints from the wrapper returndata, which we ignore since we make an extra hop.
delegateToViewImplementation(bytes).return: The returned bytes from the delegatecall

getItemTimeLimitation(uint256).details: Retrieve user's start time for burning.

getLockedBalance(address).details: Retrieve user's locked balance and locked net worth.  account user's account.

getUserBurnTimeLimite(address).details: Retrieve user's start time for burning.  user user's account.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

lockedBalanceOf(address).details: Retrieve user's locked balance.  account user's account.

lockedWorthOf(address).details: Retrieve user's locked net worth.  account user's account.

mint(address,uint256).details: mint user's FPT when user add collateral.  account user's account. amount amount of FPT.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemLockedCollateral(address,uint256,u.details: An interface of redeem locked FPT, when user redeem collateral, only manager contract can invoke.  account user's account. tokenAmount amount of FPT. leftCollateral left available collateral in collateral pool, priced in USD.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTimeLimitation(uint256).details: set time limitation, only owner can invoke.

totalSupply().return: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: FPTCoin is finnexus collateral Pool token, implement ERC20 interface.

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the current allowance from `owner` for `spender` owner The address of the account which owns the tokens to be spent spender The address of the account which may transfer tokens

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the token balance of the `owner` owner The address of the account to query

delegateToImplementation(bytes).notice: Delegates execution to the implementation contract

delegateToViewImplementation(bytes).notice: Delegates execution to an implementation contract

totalSupply().notice: Transfer `amount` tokens from `msg.sender` to `dst` dst  The address of the destination account amount  The number of tokens to transfer
